Github

Very basic rules/objective:
Place notes in your sequence. Using your notes to paint, try to convert all players to your color palette.
The game ends when all players are the same color.

Basic controls:
v : Toggle view between the whole game and your area.
space (with a ball in your area) : Add a note to your sequence.
1 or 2 (after breaking a ball) : Start a build phase or a fight phase.
w/a/s/d : Move (cannot move horizontally during a build phase).
h : Hide/unhide the cursor.
i : Hide/unhide these instructions.
m : Mute/unmute sound.
b : Start the game. Players cannot join the room after the game has started.

Additional Notes:
This is really only tested for Chrome and may not work in other browsers.
Refresh the page if you want to join a different room or encounter errors.
A room will reset when all its players leave.
If players leave or disconnect from a room, they can rejoin even if the game has already started.
If you experience performance issues such as glitchy audio, try closing other other applications/tabs.
